text: Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium is a sports stadium located in New Delhi, India. The stadium was substantially renovated and modernised for the 2010 Commonwealth Games, hosting all the track and field events and opening and closing ceremonies. The cost of the renovation was around US$150 million, making it as the most expensive stadium ever built in India and Southern Asia. == References == Category:Buildings and structures in New Delhi Category:Stadiums in Asia Category:National symbols of India Category:Commonwealth Games
title: Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium (Delhi)
